page.description: The D directive causes the line spacing in a list box to be adjusted automatically for the point size of the type being displayed.

section.title: Example
section.example: fonts = <<%str% Arial,10 Arial,12 Arial,14 Arial,16 Arial,18 Times New Roman,10 Times New Roman,12 Times New Roman,14 Times New Roman,16 Times New Roman,18 Courier,10 Courier,12 Courier,14 Courier,16 Courier,18 %str% ui_dlg_box("fonts",<<%dlg% [%d;O={F=@1}{J=CL}{@1}%.80,20font^#fonts]; %dlg%)
